participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and creative, she loves to help others and express herself through music.
participant_1.background: i volunteer at the homeless shelter. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i play several instruments. my father played violin professionally. i'm a piano teacher on the side.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Disciplined and straightforward, he values camaraderie and enjoys simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: i'm in the army. i didn't graduate high school. my favourite food is shawarma. i live in canada.
